attributes.action: Require credit card companies to reduce their high rates of interest immediately
attributes.additional_details: At this time of national crisis, it is unfair to expect people who at risk of losing their jobs and/or income to pay the very high rates of interest that credit card companies charge.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to require all credit card companies to reduce their high rates of interest immediately and for the entire duration of this coronavirus national emergency

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305297

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
